conclusion: Understand relationship between light source, objects, and shadows
Light source indicated by red arrows pointing to mirror and shadow
Light source positioned above the objects
Shadow of light source cast on ground follows shape of objects
Shadow will shift when light source moves to back left
Objects will move in relation to new shadow position
Objects closer to light source appear larger in shadow
A likely remains in same position
Objects shift when light source moves to back left
Final answer: A moves to the right, B moves to the right, C moves to the left, D moves to the left
